about.intro2: a senior in Information Management at Tamkang University, Graduating in June 2025. I followed the regular curriculum during college but only found my passion for web development in my senior year through the capstone project.
about.intro3: Since then, I’ve been self-learning and building projects to improve my skills. Though I started late, I’m patient and enjoy challenges, always eager to grow.
about.intro4: I believe it’s never too late to learn. With steady effort, I’m ready to face new challenges and look forward to applying my skills in real-world web development.

exp1.title: IT Department / Helpdesk
exp1.description: I have gained hands-on experience working in a multinational corporate environment, where I became familiar with handling day-to-day technical support needs within a large-scale IT infrastructure. My responsibilities include software installation, network troubleshooting, account and permission management, and remote support. I often need to identify and resolve issues quickly under time pressure. Common technical issues I deal with involve Citrix remote desktop, O365 applications, SFTP tools, and more.

exp2.title: Web Development (Self-Learning)
exp2.description: Exploring modern web technologies through self-directed learning and projects, including full-stack development with React, Node.js, MongoDB, and related tools.

fiorvo.title: Fiorvo - fashion eCommerce
fiorvo.desc: Fiorvo is a fashion e-commerce site built with the MERN stack, featuring a customer storefront and an admin dashboard for managing products, orders, and shipping.

chatApp.title: Real-time Chat App
chatApp.desc: A real-time chat app built with the MERN stack and Socket.IO, featuring multi-theme support and seamless live messaging between users.
chatApp.desc2: ⚠️ Note: This app is deployed on Render's free plan, so the server may take around 30 seconds to wake up on the first login due to server cold start. Please be patient during this initial loading time.
